column1: CTV's relationship comedy ``Satisfaction'' follows the lives of couple Maggie Bronson and Jason Howell, along with their single friend and roommate Mark Movenpick as they navigate their way through their early 20s. Maggie and Jason attempt to keep the spark alive in their long-term relationship while facing day-to-day challenges, while Mark attempts to hustle the dating scene. Caught between their immature pasts and taking the next step toward maturity, the trio experiences the realities of adult situations, like opening a joint bank account or befriending another couple.
